statements: DELETE FROM VoterVerification WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM VoterVerification WHERE voter_id = 101 AND last_name = 'Smith';
DELETE FROM VoterVerification WHERE first_name = 'John' AND date_of_birth = '1990-05-20';
DELETE FROM voter WHERE voter_id = 101 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM voter_registration WHERE verification_status = TRUE
DELETE FROM vote_records WHERE verifying_officer = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 101 AND is_eligible = FALSE;
